thread.section_title: MirrorMate Frames Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MirrorMate Frames | mirrormate.com
thread.title: Frank

author: Frank
title: Frank
text:
It's beautiful, butâ€¦
1. Put it together on a solid surface, not a soft rug, or while the back looks great, the front may get spaces you don't want when you turn it over after the glue is dry.
2. If you put anything between the mirror and the frame after it's done, (like a piece of paper of any sort) it will stick SO severely that you won't be able to remove it because of the sticking strips, AND it will reflect in the mirror to be seen FOREVER !
